attributes.action: arrange for the Red Arrows to be included in the 2012 Olympic Games displays.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It is unthinkable that a display team so uniquely British and so effective in flying the flag for Great Britain should not be in the forefront of the displays for the 2012 Olympic Games to be hosted by us.We cannot think of another country with such an iconic display team known all over the world,
which would exclude them from their presentation.The mere suggestion of doing so is madness.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
